description: Crusaders and Rosenborg level as Hearts await
title: Crusaders and Rosenborg level as Hearts await
title_page: Crusaders and Rosenborg level as Hearts await - BBC Sport
maintext:
Crusaders and Rosenborg are evenly poised heading into the second leg of their Europa Conference League qualifier.
With Hearts awaiting the winner in the third round of qualifying, both sides played out an entertaining draw in their first leg in Belfast.
The Northern Irish side took an early lead, but found themselves 2-1 down at the break before notching a 74th-minute equaliser.
The return leg takes place in Norway next Thursday.
